title: Top Places to visit in Sirmaur, Nahan, Himachal Pradesh
content: Sirmaur is the southern most district in the south-eastern region of Himachal Pradesh, India. It is largely mountainous and rural, with 90% of its population living in villages. Some of its towns include Nahan (the capital), Paonta Sahib and Suketi, the latter known for the Shivalik Fossil Park w
